Title: Flick Medium Height Sideboard

Details.Dimensions:: H 33 x W 60 x D 19 (All Dimension in Inches)

Description: Established in 2011, Zorin has established itself as a major furniture powerhouse in a relatively small period. Manufactured from high-grade engineered wood, Zorins products have become outstanding hallmarks of quality, elegance, durability & affordability. Traditional Style takes inspiration from indigenous arts and craft originating from the Indian sub-continent and certain style periods pertaining to the early Baroque and French eras. Traditional furniture is synonymous with artistic embellishments, contrasting inlays, plush fabrics, decorative trims, crown moldings and intricate details. A chest of drawers, also called a bureau, is a type of cabinet that has multiple parallel, horizontal drawers usually stacked one above another. Chests of drawers have traditionally been used for storing clothing, especially underwear, socks, and other items not normally hung in or otherwise stored in a closet. They are usually placed in a bedroom for this purpose but can actually be used to store anything that will fit inside.
